titleStmt.title: Remarks upon a late paper, entituled, A true relation of the cursed designs and intrigues which have been lately carry'd on, both in England and France, to restore the late King James, &c. discovered by some gentlemen lately arriv'd from St. Germaines.

notesStmt.note: States in text that "A true relation ..." was originally called "A short and true relation of the intrigues transacted both at home and abroad to restore the late King James".
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
